Minneapolis.KZGO: KZGO (95.3 FM) is a Rhythmic Top 40 radio station licensed to St. Paul, Minnesota, serving the Twin Cities area. The station, known as "Go 95.3", is owned by Go Media, with sister station KQGO, through licensee Northern Lights Broadcasting, LLC. KZGO's studios are located in the Ford Building on Fifth Avenue across from Target Field (and the similarly named METRO station) in downtown Minneapolis, while its transmitter is located atop the IDS Center.
